# Technical Manual {#sec-tech_manual}

This chapter contains the Technical Manual of the RS MINERVE software.

## Manual's structure {.unnumbered}

The Technical manual is organised in 7 chapters:

1.  [Hydrological and hydraulic models description](#sec-tech_hydrological_models)

2.  [Performance indicators](#sec-tech_performance_indicators)

3.  [Calibration algorithms](#sec-tech_calibration_algorithms)

4.  [Visual basic scripts](#sec-tech_scripts)

5.  [Files formats](#sec-tech_file_formats)

6.  [Database formats](#sec-tech_database_formats)

7.  [GIS formats](#sec-tech_gis_formats)

For the RS MINERVE software utilisation, the reader can also use the RS MINERVE User's Manual.
